project_name.justification: The article describes an acquisition of claims that are being added to the existing Flat project. The headline is: "Tectonic Metals Acquires Three Additional Potential Intrusions On-Trend with the Flat Gold Project".

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified in the first paragraph: "Tectonic Metals Inc. (TSXV:TECT)(OTCQB:TETOF)(FSE:T15B) ("Tectonic" or the "Company"), a mineral exploration company... today announced the acquisition..."

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO is identified at the end of the press release: "On behalf of Tectonic Metals Inc., Tony Reda President and Chief Executive Officer".

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The agreement provides an option to acquire a full interest in the claims: "Tectonic shall have the option at any time prior to the sixth anniversary to purchase 100% interest in the claims for US$200,000..."

primary_commodity.justification: The project is explicitly referred to as a gold project: "The Flat Gold Project - Alaska's Next Tier 1 Opportunity".

verified_article_link.justification: The article is directly about the Flat Gold Project and an acquisition of adjacent claims, as stated in the headline.

currency.justification: The payment terms are specified in US dollars: "Under terms of the agreement for the Third Party acquired claims, Tectonic will pay the lessor US$25,000 at execution of the lease..."

cash_payments_raw.justification: Per the financial data extraction hierarchy, this field is null because the primary consideration for the acquisition is a combined cash and share payment, which is populated in `cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw`.

share_payments_raw.justification: Per the financial data extraction hierarchy, this field is null because the primary consideration for the acquisition is a combined cash and share payment, which is populated in `cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw`.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The consideration to exercise the option to purchase the claims is a value that can be paid in either cash or shares: "Tectonic shall have the option at any time prior to the sixth anniversary to purchase 100% interest in the claims for US$200,000 payable in cash or common shares of Tectonic Metals Inc."

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The number of shares to be issued is not specified in the text.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: Share warrants are not mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: Option payments are not mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

issued_share_price.justification: A price per share for the transaction is not specified in the text.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The exploration commitment is specified as a monetary value, not in meters of drilling.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The total exploration commitment is the sum of required expenditures over five years ($50,000 + $100,000 + $100,000 + $200,000 + $200,000): "Fifty Thousand Dollars (US$50,000.00) before December 1, 2024; and An additional One Hundred Thousand Dollars (US$100,000.00) before December 1, 2025; and An additional One Hundred Thousand Dollars (US$100,000.00) before December 1, 2026; and An additional Two Hundred Thousand Dollars (US$200,000.00) before December 1, 2027; and An additional Two Hundred Thousand Dollars (US$200,000.00) before December 1, 2028."

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The seller retains a Net Smelter Return royalty as part of the transaction terms: "Tectonic shall pay the Lessor a 2.0% Net Smelter Return royalty on all precious Mineral Products produced and sold from the Claims."

coverage_area_raw.justification: The transaction specifically covers the claims acquired from a third party, not the claims staked by Tectonic. "2,720 acres (17 x 160 acres state claims) were acquired from a third-party vendor".

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the acquired area is specified as acres: "2,720 acres (17 x 160 acres state claims) were acquired from a third-party vendor".

resource_size.justification: The text mentions historical placer production and drill intercepts, but does not provide a formal mineral resource estimate with tonnage and grade.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The company's primary stock listing is provided in the introductory paragraph: "Tectonic Metals Inc. (TSXV:TECT)(OTCQB:TETOF)(FSE:T15B)".
